body:
Comment 9: 
About a second before it went into its loop this time, I got the following line in my
log file:

2013-03-06 14:35:41,10.1.10.203,ignore,%v(PANIC=runtime error: invalid memory address or
nil pointer dereference),GET,200,application/pdf,0,"","","",""

The item that was replaced by a panic message was a URL (which I had just used to
download a PDF). Is the garbage collector freeing objects that it shouldn't?
